posts.post_title: Forsale 1906 White Sox Team PC postally unused
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jim Manos
Neat piece original postcard and a little larger than the normal pc. This is 6 1/2 x 5  copyright by (looks like) Frech, Wagner. Also back say's Mailing Card not postcard (maybe that is why it is larger?? Don't know) $450 Right edge seems to be trimmed.  Feel frre to make a offer. went to ebay
